name: Re-Volt
overview: Radio control racing done right! Rip it up with realistic physics, power-packed weapons and interactive environments! Blast through traffic with bottle rockets, water balloons and oil slicks! Four-player racing madness! Stunt Track, Battle Tag and four different racing modes. Barrel through museums, trash toy stores or design your own track with our custom editor! True R/C physics! Objects and surfaces affect the action just like real life.
